00026 #include <fstream>
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <string>
00029 #include "Global.h"
00030 
00031 void 
00032 WrapperParticleNumbers(unsigned isnap){
00033   writedebug(DEBUG," * Extracting particle numbers...");
00034   std::ifstream fin;
00035   std::ofstream fout;
00036   fin.open ((Folder("output")+Snaps(isnap)+"/ahf_out_"+Snaps(isnap)+"_particles").c_str(), std::ios_base::in);
00037   fout.open((Folder("output")+Snaps(isnap)+"/ahf_out_"+Snaps(isnap)+"_particles2").c_str(), std::ios_base::out );
00038   int Idummy = 0;
00039   int Ihalos = 0;
00040   int Icounter = 0;
00041   float Fdummy = 0.0f;
00042 
00043   fin >> Ihalos;
00044   for(;Ihalos>0;--Ihalos){
00045     fin >> Idummy;
00046     fin >> Icounter;
00047     fout << Icounter << std::endl;
00048     fin >> Fdummy;
00049     for(int i=0; i < Icounter; ++i){
00050       fin >> Idummy;
00051       fout << Idummy << std::endl;
00052       fin >> Idummy;
00053       fin >> Fdummy;
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   fin.close();
00058   fout.close();
00059   donedebug(DEBUG);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void 
00063 CreateHaloTrackerParameterFile( unsigned isnap ){
00064   std::cout << " * Creating HaloTracker parameter file..." << Folder("amigabin");
00065   std::ofstream fout;
00066   fout.open ( (Folder("amigabin")+"parameters_HaloTracker.txt").c_str(), std::ios_base::out );
00067   fout << "0" << std::endl //HaloID
00068        << "ahf_out_" << std::endl //ahf prefix
00069        << "2" << std::endl// no. snapshots
00070        << Folder("snaps") << Snaps(isnap) << "/snap_" << Snaps(isnap) << std::endl
00071        << Folder("snaps") << Snaps(isnap) << "/snap_" << Snaps(isnap) << std::endl
00072        << std::endl;
00073   fout.close();
00074   writedone();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void 
00078 RunHaloTracker(void){
00079   writelndebug(DEBUG," * Running HaloTracker...");
00080   std::string now = "";
00081   now = Folder("amigabin") + "./HaloTracker < " + Folder("amigabin") + "parameters_HaloTracker.txt";
00082   RunCommand(now);
00083   //std::cin.get(); //wait for input
00084 }
00085 
00086 void 
00087 MoveHaloTrackerOutput(unsigned isnap){
00088   writedebug(DEBUG, " * Moving ahf_out_ files...");
00089   std::string now = "mv ahf_out_* " + Folder("output") + Snaps(isnap);
00090   RunCommand( now );
00091   donedebug(DEBUG);
00092 }
00093 
00094 void 
00095 HaloTrackerRun( unsigned isnap ){
00096   // already done in MergeTree
00097   WrapperParticleNumbers(isnap);
00098   CreateHaloTrackerParameterFile(isnap);
00099   RunHaloTracker();
00100   MoveHaloTrackerOutput(isnap);
00101 }
